as a SIon main I hope this is the case
Could be because he's Legendary, so they have to do more work there in order to make that work.

The main difference between Legendary and Epic tier skins is the completely new VO. Legendary may have a bit more VFX, but not that much. I could understand if it was an issue where making chromas for 4 champions was too much for one patch (I don't think I've ever seen more than 3 champions at once), and they wanted to make sure Sion got _really good_ chromas on his own, in the future, rather than just a few average ones now. 

I just want to know if there's hope for him, and if we're going to have to wait a year or more for it.

Eh, Legendary also have completely new animation/riggings vs their base.  As it is like making a new champion when they make those skins.  So there's a bit more to it.

I do agree though that Sion needs one as the rest of them have em, but then again they just did Kha, Aatrox, and Rengar which have 6, 3, 5 chromas respectively so that was already quite a few things to do.  

Chromas aren't just plain recolors anymore either, they do have textures, gradients, effects colors, etc so I'd say that 14 Chromas for this batch was quite a lot to do. Since they do have to get the colors to match the way they want, test them to make sure everything works and looks decent.
